title: Black & White: Impossible Crimes Unit
description: In the city of Port Harbour, the most unsolvable cases are tasked to an elite squad known as the Impossible Crimes Unit. This is their story.
quote: Neighbors reported a Wilhelm scream at 3:00 a.m.
altHero: Detective Green, a white woman with blonde hair, and her partner Detective Turner, a black man, strike a pose in a doorway
alt1: Turner and Green show a photo to a witness
alt2: Turner holds an animal bone and Green holds a gun while they look at each other
alt3: Jonathan Wu smiles at his detective partners
alt4: Lana Lee talks with the IT guy
